title: Step2 Adventure Playhouse
description: Inflatable fun for active minds and bodies alike!

asset.author: Step2
asset.description: Inflatable fun for active minds and bodies alike!

transcripts: Every princess needs a play house. The step 2 inflatable play house has a big hit for our toddler  and preschooler. They open up the door, step inside, and it's like they entered their own enchanted cottage. There's an open window on the other side so they can see out and climb through. And it's spacious enough for both of them to play inside at the same time. We have specially used this inflatable house on rainy days and during does cold and winter months. I love the bright pink and purple colors and the adorable flowers and butterflies. It matches their decor perfectly so it's not a toy I have to keep out of sight. The playhouse is easy to deflate and store. When it comes to inflatable active fun, it doesn't get much better than this step2 inflatable playhouse.
